        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • FormatTable

        public static java.lang.String FormatTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                           java.lang.String[] myTable,
                           java.lang.String fieldSep,
                           java.lang.String commentIdentifier,
                           int CommentedRowBehaviour,
                           java.lang.String regex)
                                    throws TextFormatException
        Format a text table addind the right number of space to the table columns
        Parameters:
        tableName - Tha name of the table
        myTable - The table as a string array
        fieldSep - Fields separator
        commentIdentifier - Comment identifier
        CommentedRowBehaviour - 0 = commented row not considered, 1 = try to format commented rows, 2 = delete commented rows
        regex - Regular expression to remove. If formed by several consecutives field separator (i.e. ",,,,,")
        Returns:
        A string representing the formatted table
        Throws:
        TextFormatException
